data.name: Ruined King: A League of Legends Story™ - Ruination Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Ruination Starter Pack is included with the Ruined King: A League of Legends Story™ - Deluxe Edition Bundle

Content Includes:
- Deluxe Potion Pack: A chest full of potions to aid the Champions in facing danger.
- Plunderer's Pendant: A golden pendant worn by those who seek great fortune. Grants 10% bonus gold from combat.
- Savant's Tome: A trinket carried by those who have studied the intricacies of combat. Grants 10% bonus xp from combat.

fullgame.name: Ruined King: A League of Legends Story™

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese, Turkish*, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300, AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Vega 8 / Intel Iris Plus / Geforce GTX 650 / Radeon HD 7770 (2GB VRAM Required)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended for 1080p, 30FPS on Medium Settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100, AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 660Ti, Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended for 1440p, 60FPS on High Settings
